title: React Native Helsinki Meetup
description: The next React Native Helsinki Meetup is just around the corner! Join us to meet fellow developers and enthusiasts, learn from real-world experience, and help shaping our growing local community.

talks.title: Building Native Modules for Old & New Architecture
talks.description: How to create your own native modules with full backward compatibility.

talks.title: SQLite Inserts at the Speed of Light
talks.description: Learn how to achieve over 10x faster data ingestion into your on-device SQLite database.

title: React Native Helsinki, Shipaton Edition
description: After a warm summer, it's the perfect time for the second React Native Helsinki event. This time in collaboration with Shipaton by RevenueCat. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, hopefully you'll find valuable insights here. Join us to connect with fellow developers, learn from real-world projects, and help to shape this growing local community.

talks.title: Subscriptions and Virtual Currencies - Monetizing Your React Native App
talks.description: Learn how to monetize your React Native app with subscriptions and virtual currencies.

talks.title: Deep Linking in React Native
talks.description: Learn how to implement deep linking in your React Native applications.

title: React Native Helsinki Launch Event
description: We're excited to invite you to the React Native Helsinki Launch Event, the first official meetup of the community. This event is for anyone interested in building with React Native, whether you're just getting started or already building apps professionally. Come meet fellow developers, learn from real-life projects, and take part in shaping this new local community.

talks.title: Building Hybrid Native/Web Apps
talks.description: See how you can build web apps using React Native and convert existing web apps into native apps with practical, real-life examples.

talks.title: React Native Accessibility 360
talks.description: How to build accessible apps in React Native. From design processes to hands-on development tips.
